The TruBarrier Hazard Mask by Greycat Industrial helps its user face unexpected environmental hazards while keeping the most vulnerable parts of the head safe from damage. The encapsualted design provides full-body protection from direct contact with dangerous materials when worn with its accompanying jumpsuit.
